data.name: 1387: MMO Strategy
data.detailed_description:
1387 is a MMO Strategy game where you are one of the first explorers of the New World. Manage your island and make it the most powerful colony in the game!

About The Game

The game is inspired by mobile and web based mmo strategy games. You must manage your economy, upgrade farms and other economical resources.

And you should choose your side between defending your colony or being a pirate that spreads his name in the new world with his monsters.

Join Beta

Join our Discord server to join closed beta when it starts. You can find an invitation link on the sidebar of this page.

Warning

In this game, you can only use your mouse. It is not a game where you control a character or units. You only do decisions, wait for their results and do new decisions. This is the core game loop.

data.short_description: 1387 is a MMO Strategy game where you are one of the first explorers of the New World. Manage your island and make it the most powerful colony in the game!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: If your computer runs Windows 10 smoothly, i think it will be able to run the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: If your computer runs Windows 10 smoothly, i think it will be able to run the game.
